CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Restricted_Industry__c,'CRB'),false, AND(Do_Not_Call__c = false , Email_Opt_Out__c = false , Out_of_Business__c = false , Benetrac_Indicator__c = false , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Ecommerce')) , (RecordType.DeveloperName ="CoreAccountRecordType" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "MMSAccountRecordType") , PEOLeasing__c = true , NOT(AdvancedPartnerClients__c) ,(ISBLANK( Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_BenAdmin__c = false) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this box is checked, this prospect is workable for the PEO rep. Do Not Call = False Email Opt Out = False Out of Business = False PEO/Leasing = True
CustomField.label: PEO Workable
